plays.text: Penalty to Alex Tanguay 2 minutes for Tripping Peter Bondra
Penalty to Ivan Ciernik 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Mike Keane
Goal scored by Steve Reinprecht assisted by Martin Skoula and Adam Foote
Penalty to Jeff Shantz 2 minutes for Hooking Jason Doig
Penalty to Alex Tanguay 2 minutes for Tripping Sergei Gonchar
Goal scored by Jeff Halpern assisted by Steve Konowalchuk and Calle Johansson
Goal scored by Jaromir Jagr assisted by Michael Nylander and Sergei Gonchar
Goal scored by Milan Hejduk assisted by Alex Tanguay and Martin Skoula
Penalty to Vaclav Nedorost 2 minutes for Holding(opposing player not identified)
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Ivan Ciernik
Penalty to Rob Blake 2 minutes for Holding Michael Nylander
